text.div:
COVID19 Value Set for Oxygen Saturation, Blood

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    20564-1 Oxygen saturation in Blood
    2708-6 Oxygen saturation in Arterial blood
    2711-0 Oxygen saturation in Venous blood
    2713-6 Oxygen saturation Calculated from oxygen partial pressure in Blood
    51731-8 Oxygen saturation Calculated from oxygen partial pressure in Venous blood
    51733-4 Oxygen saturation Calculated from oxygen partial pressure in Arterial blood
    59408-5 Oxygen saturation in Arterial blood by Pulse oximetry
    71841-1 Oxygen saturation [Pure mass fraction] Calculated from oxygen partial pressure in Venous blood
    71843-7 Oxygen saturation [Pure mass fraction] Calculated from oxygen partial pressure in Arterial blood
    71844-5 Oxygen saturation [Pure mass fraction] Calculated from oxygen partial pressure in Blood

name: COVID19 Value Set for Oxygen Saturation, Blood
